name: The Elements...In Space!
description:
Dish out fire and ice at enemies. An enemy hit by both becomes wet. What happens if you hit a wet enemy?

Known Issues (None prevent play, although the first one might trip some up.)
  • When clicking the "Restart" button, seemingly nothing happens. The level did restart; now click the "Play" button to play.
  • Enemy movement causes them to cluster up in an uninteresting way.
  • Sound effects are bleh.
  • Menu transition when player is hit by enemy is abrupt and doesn't communicate well what happened.
  • After the player is hit by an enemy and the player clicks the "Play" button, the player simply resumes and can safely back away from enemies.
  • There is no win condition. Once all enemies are defeated, the player is left roaming around with nothing.
